info: Ravi Kumar is a certified yoga instructor with over 10 years of experience teaching gentle yoga sessions suitable for all ages. He focuses on mindfulness, flexibility, and stress reduction, helping beginners build a strong foundation in yoga practices.

Alex Martin is a passionate guitarist who has been teaching acoustic guitar for over 8 years. He specializes in guiding beginners through chord progressions, strumming techniques, and building confidence to play simple songs from day one.

Giovanni Rossi is an Italian chef with 15 years of culinary experience. He offers hands-on classes focusing on traditional Italian dishes, teaching everything from fresh pasta making to authentic sauces, and sharing his love for Italian cuisine.
